1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 import rospy
3 from std_msgs.msg import Int32MultiArray, Float32MultiArray

5 
6 class PID(object):
7  """
8  PID regulator algorithm
9  """
10  def __init__(self, Kp, Ki, Kd):
11  self.prev_error = 0
12  self.proportional = 0
13  self.integral = 0
14  self.differential = 0
15  self.Kp = Kp
16  self.Ki = Ki
17  self.Kd = Kd
18 
19  @staticmethod
20  def constrain(value):
21  if value > 100:
22  value = 100
23  if value < -100:
24  value = -100
25  return value
26 
27  def regulate(self, current, target, dt):
28  """
29  current: current value of regulated parameter
30  target: target value of regulated paremeter
31  dt: sampling period
32  return: regulation signal
33  """
34  error = float(current - target)
35  self.proportional = error * self.Kp
36  self.integral += error * dt * self.Ki
37  self.integral = PID.constrain(self.integral)
38  self.differential = (error - self.prev_error) / dt * self.Kd
39  self.prev_error = error
40  return PID.constrain(self.proportional + self.integral + self.differential)
41 
42 
43 class ControlSystem(object):
44  __instanse = None
45 
46  def __new__(cls, *args, **kwargs):
47  if not isinstance(cls.__instanse, cls):
48  cls.__instanse = super(ControlSystem, cls).__new__(cls)
49  return cls.__instanse
50 
51  def __del__(self):
52  ControlSystem.__instanse = None
53 
54  def __init__(self):
55  self.__powers = [0, 0, 0, 0, 0]
56  self.pid_roll = 0
57  self.pid_pitch = 0
58  self.pid_yaw = 0
59 
60  self.Kp, self.Ki, self.Kd = None, None, None
61 
62  self.t = rospy.get_time()
63 
64 
65  @property
66  def powers(self):
67  return self.__powers
68 
69 
70  @powers.setter
71  def powers(self, angles):
72  roll, pitch, yaw = angles
73  # print(angles)
74  dt = rospy.get_time() - self.t
75  roll_power = self.pid_roll.regulate(roll, 0, dt) * 100 / 360
76  pitch_power = self.pid_pitch.regulate(pitch, 0, dt) * 100 / 180
77  yaw_power = self.pid_yaw.regulate(yaw, 0, dt) * 100 / 160
78 
79  if roll_power > 100:
80  roll_power = 100
81  if roll_power < -100:
82  roll_power = -100
83 
84  if pitch_power > 100:
85  pitch_power = 100
86  if pitch_power < -100:
87  pitch_power = -100
88 
89  if yaw_power > 100:
90  yaw_power = 100
91  if yaw_power < -100:
92  yaw_power = -100
93 
94  # roll_power /= 2
95  # pitch_power /= 2
96  # yaw_power /= 2
97  # print(roll_power, pitch_power, yaw_power)
98  self.__powers = [
99  round((pitch_power / 2 - roll_power)),
100  round((pitch_power / 2 + roll_power)),
101  # round(yaw_power),
102  # round(-yaw_power),
103  0, 0,
104  round(-pitch_power)
105  ]
106 
107  #self.__powers = [0,0,0,0,0]
108 
109  self.t = rospy.get_time()
110 
111  @classmethod
112  def combine(a, b):
113  if a + b == 0:
114  return 0
115  return a*a/(a+b) + b*b/(a+b)

118  def set_pid(self, Kp, Ki, Kd):
119  self.Kp = Kp
120  self.Ki = Ki
121  self.Kd = Kd
122  self.pid_roll = PID(self.Kp, self.Ki, self.Kd)
123  self.pid_pitch = PID(self.Kp, self.Ki, self.Kd)
124  self.pid_yaw = PID(self.Kp, self.Ki, self.Kd)

128 angles = [0, 0, 0]

152 
153 def move():
154  rospy.init_node('outer_control_topic')
155  global autocontrol
156 
157  autocontrol = ControlSystem()
158  autocontrol.set_pid(5, 0, 0)
159 
160 
161  rospy.Subscriber("talker_topic", Float32MultiArray, callback)
162  timer = rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration(0.01), timer_callback)
163 
164  rospy.loginfo("inner control started")
165  rospy.spin()
166  timer.shutdown()
167

171  move()
172  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
